description:
Protect your cockpit and keep it dry during overnights or when transporting your kayak. The fabric and full bungee fit most recreational boats.

  • Made of durable nylon with a waterproof coating
  • Adjustable bungee with GripTex rand for a secure seal
  • Adjustable cross-deck strap
  • Coloured nylon pull handle
  • XL fits cockpits 76-89cm long, 43-51cm wide
  • XXXL fits cockpits 89-99cm long, 51-58cm wide
  • 5XL fits cockpits 110-120cm long, 65-75cm wide
name: Level Six Nylon Cockpit Cover
